readingMnemonic: His <kanji>inspection</kanji> is complete, but it looks like he's used an <reading>etch</reading> (えつ) a sketch to record all the results. That's not really helpful. If you shake it all the inspection results will disappear!
meaningMnemonic: Put a <radical>guard</radical> at your <radical>gate</radical> to get a good <kanji>inspection</kanji> of your neighborhood going. The guard will stand there all day inspecting everything and then report it all back to you. You won't have to do any of the inspection yourself!
